violations.description: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds (WCAG 2 AA)
violations.help: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.recommendation: Review color combinations and ensure contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 for normal text and 3:1 for large text

recommendations.issue: Fix color contrast violations (105+ found)
recommendations.action: Review CSS variables and ensure all text meets WCAG 2 AA contrast requirements

recommendations.issue: Add skip-to-main-content link
recommendations.action: Add skip link for keyboard navigation

recommendations.issue: Verify all pages are responsive at all breakpoints
recommendations.action: Review screenshots and fix any layout issues

recommendations.issue: Input component has proper label support
recommendations.finding: Input component includes label, aria-describedby, and aria-invalid attributes

recommendations.issue: Add client-side validation error messages
recommendations.finding: Some forms may lack client-side validation

sorting.note: Table component does not have built-in sorting

pagination.note: PaginatedTable component exists and is used in some pages

filtering.note: Some tables have filters via AdvancedFilters component

recommendations.issue: Add table sorting functionality
recommendations.action: Implement sortable column headers in Table component

recommendations.issue: Ensure all data tables use PaginatedTable for large datasets
recommendations.action: Review tables and migrate to PaginatedTable where appropriate

placeholderText.note: Placeholder attributes found are legitimate HTML placeholder attributes for form inputs

recommendations.issue: No placeholder content found in production code

breadcrumbs.recommendation: Consider adding breadcrumbs for better navigation context

keyboardNavigation.issue: Keyboard navigation should be tested on all interactive elements
keyboardNavigation.recommendation: Ensure all interactive elements are keyboard accessible and have visible focus indicators

recommendations.issue: Add breadcrumb navigation
recommendations.action: Implement breadcrumb component for better navigation context

recommendations.issue: Test keyboard navigation on all pages
recommendations.action: Verify all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
